div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.h5: CLICK HERE to go to our Tech Help page

a.style: background-color: initial; font-size: 15px; font-weight: 400; text-align: left;

div.h1: This page is designed to collect and provide COVID-19 information for the SLC Community.
div.p:
Please refer to the CDC for all health information
https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/index.html
div.h2: CLICK HERE to view our distance learning week 3 update
div.h4: Use the below link to view our Distance Learning Plan

div.p: March 30-April 30 - Distance Education following the school calendar (no on site education)
We at SLC have developed a plan to continue to provide meals to students. Breakfast and sack lunches will be available for pick up at three locations each weekday from 10 AM - 1 PM.
The pickup locations will be the parking lots of:
Northdale Oil Convenience (8000 Irvine Ave NW)
Harmony Natural Foods (302 Irvine Ave NW)
